title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 10, ch. II, subch. B, pt. 40 - State Aid for Public Health Services: Counties and Cities
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 10, ch. II, subch. B, pt. 40 - State Aid for Public Health Services: Counties and Cities

State Regulations

Subpart 40-1 - Application and Payment (§ 40-1.0 to 40-1.62)

Subpart 40-2 - Performance Standards and Minimum Requirements for Core Public Health Services

Subpart 40-4 - Fee and Revenue Plan for Departmental Services (§ 40-4.0 to 40-4.2)

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 10, ch. II, subch. B, pt. 40

Amended, New

York State Register December 31, 2014/Volume XXXVI, Issue 52, eff. 12/31/2014

Statutory authority: Public Health Law, art. 6, §§ 602, 603
and 619

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
